original: Bergvall, Axel Ivar, fabrikör, Norrköping, f. 8/2/85 i Norrköping av rådni. o. fabr. Axel K. B. o. Ida Svensson. G. 13 m. Eva Forsman. — Lä-roverksstud., hand:s’k. Res. i Tyskl, Engl., Frankr. Eg. fabr. o. fam :bol. A-B Axel K. Bergvall & Söner. Led. av styr. f. Norrköp. sparb., System-bol,, A-B Axel K. Bergvall & Söner, fastigh :äg :fören., fastigh :äg :fören. samköpsfören.
translated: Bergvall, Axel Ivar was a manufacturer from Norrköping. He was born on February 8th, 1885, in Norrköping to councilman and manufacturer Axel K.B. and Ida Svensson. He married Eva Forsman in 19XX and had been educated in high school and business school. He traveled to Germany, England, and France. He owned a factory and a family company called A-B Axel K. Bergvall & Sons, and was a member of the board of directors for Norrköp. Savings Bank, System Company, A-B Axel K. Bergvall & Sons, the property owner association, and the property owner cooperative.
